EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to send for users to notify on task being created
EmailTemplate.name: Set Customer's Service Guarantees
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Account.Name} - Set Customer's Service Guarantees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
The Account {!Account.Name} has gone live. Please create the entitlements for customer in the system.
{!Account.FLOW_URL__c}
Thank you.
